an acceptable time ,= a time of acceptance. Quoted in a 2 Corinthians 6:2 .

heard ,= answered.

a covenant of the People ,= the covenant of a People. Compare Isaiah 42:6 ,, Isaiah 42:7 . Hebrew. am ,, not goi ,as in Isaiah 49:7 .
